      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateMessageCreditPullConfirmation" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];

var contactModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartiesContact');
var contact = contactModel.data[0];

var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var partyId = contact.Id;
var partyName = party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;

var title = 'Get Credit Report of ' + partyName;
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to get the credit report of <strong>'
                + partyName + '</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = "No, do not get it.";
var okText = "Yes, Continue.";
var okAction = {
    func: 'getCreditReport',
    parameters: [appId, partyId, partyName]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
    title: title,
    message: message,
    cancelText: cancelText,
    okText: okText,
    okAction: okAction
});
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="PRD_LaunchFinancialStatementAnalysis" cachelocation="false">var $ = skuid.$;

var party = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty').data[0];
if(party.clcommon__Account__c){
    var title = 'Financial Analysis - ' + party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
    var skuidPage = 'AccountStatements';

    // get template id
    var templateRecord = skuid.model.getModel('PRD_ApplicableFinancialStatementTemplate').data[0];
    if(templateRecord !== undefined){
    var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&accountid=' + party.clcommon__Account__c + '&templateid=' + templateRecord.Id;

    openTopLevelDialog({
        title: title,
        iframeUrl: iframeUrl
    });
    } else {
        alert('No financial templates found!');
    }
}


</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="onLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

var copyPartyButton =  document.getElementById('copy-party-button');

{
    if(copyPartyButton.style.display != "none")
    {
        var arrowEle = document.getElementsByClassName("sk-dropnav-arrow")[0];
        arrowEle.classList.add("shift-arrow-to-left");
    }
}
var modelToRefreshUnlock = skuid.model.getModel("PartyRelationshipDetails_ApplicationLockStatus");
var applicationLock = skuid.model.getModel("NGLoanDashBoard_ApplicationLockStatus");
if(applicationLock !== undefined && modelToRefreshUnlock !== undefined) {
    if (applicationLock.getFirstRow().RecordStatus ) {
        modelToRefreshUnlock.updateRow(modelToRefreshUnlock.getFirstRow(), {
           RecordStatus : true
        });
    }
}

var title = 'Geocode for '+party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var borrowerId;
    if(party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Corporation' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Limited Liability Company' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Partnership' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Association' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Trust' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Government')
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
   else if(party.clcommon__Contact__c && (party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Individual' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Sole Proprietorship') )
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Contact__c;
    }else{
        borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
var retVal = sforce.apex.execute('intframework.IntegrationWebService','getIntegrationUIInformation',{
   integrationFamily :  "Geocoding",
   apiType : "Geocoding",
   executionPriority : executionPriority
});
var jsonObject = JSON.parse(retVal);
var skuidPage= jsonObject.apiSpecificUIPageName;
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&appId=' + appId +'&borrowerId='+borrowerId;
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});

</jsitem>

$.blockUI({
message: message,
onBlock:function(){
FICOCalloutClass();
}
});	
	
function FICOCalloutClass(){
var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var scRow = scModels.data[0];
var result = sforce.apex.execute('FICOCallout','ficoCalloutMethodForParty',
{
partyId : scRow.Id,
});

var NGLDApplication= skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationAttachments');
skuid.model.updateData([NGLDApplication],function(){
    $.unblockUI();
});

var modelToRefresh = skuid.model.getModel("RDParty");

if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
    modelToRefresh.updateData();
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="onloadDataJs" cachelocation="false" url="">
var $ = skuid.$;
$('#submitToNxtDept').attr('title', 'Submit To Next Stage');
$('#createExceptionTsks').attr('title', 'Create Exception Task');
$('#releaseToQueues').attr('title', 'Release to Queue');
$('#movePrevDep').attr('title', 'Move to Previous Department');
$('#saveTask').attr('title', 'Save Task');


var appRow = skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication').getFirstRow();
var appId = appRow.Id;
/* Query for Loan Approval */
var taskOutstandingList=skuid.model.getModel('taskOutstanding').data.length;
var PolicyExceptionList=skuid.model.getModel('NGTaskList_PolicyException').data.length;
var MandatoryTaskList=skuid.model.getModel('MandatoryTask').data.length;
var DocumentCategoryList=skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategory').data.length;


$('.square.lochmara').attr('execVal',DocumentCategoryList);
$('.square.treeP').attr('execVal',PolicyExceptionList);
$('.square.limedS').attr('execVal',MandatoryTaskList);
$('.square.tskOutstanding').attr('execVal',taskOutstandingList);

if(appRow.genesis__Overall_Status__c){
    appRow.genesis__Overall_Status__c = appRow.genesis__Overall_Status__c.replace('Being Processed By', '');
    appRow.genesis__Overall_Status__c = appRow.genesis__Overall_Status__c.replace('Waiting for', '');
}

var showSubmitButton = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.LoanDashBoard','showSubmitToNxtDeptBtn',
    {
            applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
if(showSubmitButton == 'true'){
    $('#submitToNxtDept').button('enable');
}
else{
    $('#submitToNxtDept').button('disable');
}

var ProductDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
productDepartmentData=ProductDepartmentList.data;
var ActiveDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('AppDept');
activeDepartmentRow=ActiveDepartmentList.data;


//getting Department_no_c for Active Application
var activeDeptNo=0;
var activeDepartmentId=null;
for(var i = 0; i < activeDepartmentRow.length; i++) {
    if(activeDepartmentRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active') {
        activeDepartmentId=activeDepartmentRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
    }
}
if(activeDepartmentId !== null) {
    for(var deptCount = 0; deptCount < productDepartmentData.length; deptCount++) {
        if(productDepartmentData[deptCount].genesis__Department__c == activeDepartmentId) {
            activeDeptNo = productDepartmentData[deptCount].genesis__Department_No__c;
        }
    }
}
/*Set CSS for Stage buttons */
if(appRow.genesis__CL_Product__c !== null && productDepartmentData.length > 0) {
    if(activeDeptNo !== 0) {
        for(var k = 1; k <= productDepartmentData.length; k++) {
            var departmentNode = document.querySelector("#AllDepartmentsQueue > div.nx-editor-contents > div > div > div:nth-child(" + k + ") > div > div:nth-child(1) > i");
            if (k <= activeDeptNo - 1) {
                departmentNode.style.setProperty("color","#00ae35");
            }else if(k ===activeDeptNo) {
                departmentNode.style.setProperty("color","black");
                departmentNode.click();
            }
            else {
                departmentNode.style.setProperty("color","black");
            }
        }
    }
}

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="inlineMethods" cachelocation="false" url="">
function setMessagePopupStyle() {
    var msgPopUpId;
    $.each(skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content'), function(i, row) {
        msgPopUpId = "#"+this.id;
    });

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="moveToPrevDept" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');
appModelRow = appModel.data[0];

var selector = $('.tableDisplay input[type="checkbox"]:enabled:checked');
var len = selector.length;
if (len == 1) {
    var prevDeptId = selector.parents('tr').find('td:eq(4)')[0].textContent;
    try {
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.LoanDashBoard', 'moveApplicationToPreviousDepartment', {
                applicationId : appModelRow.Id,
                previousDepartmentId : prevDeptId
        });
        var popUpId;
        $.each(skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content'), function(i, row) {
            popUpId = "#"+this.id;
        });
        skuid.$(popUpId).dialog('close');

        var title = 'Move To Previous Stage';
        var content = '<p>' + result + '</p>';
        var type = 'alert';
        if (result !== undefined && result !== null && !result[0].includes("Error")) {
            updateTaskPageInclude();
        }
        
        setTimeout(openPopUp, 2500);
    }
    catch (err) {
        alert('Error: ' + err.description);
    }
}
else if (len === 0) {
    alert('Please select one row');
}
else {
    alert('You can select only one row');
}

function openPopUp() {
    openTopLevelDialog({
        type : type,
        title: title,
        prefixHtml: content
    });
    setMessagePopupStyle();

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="EnableTaskBasedOnDepartment">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var ApplicationList=skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');
applicationlistRow = ApplicationList.data;
var ProductDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
productdepartmentlistRow=ProductDepartmentList.data;
var ActiveDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('AppDept');
activedepartmentlistRow=ActiveDepartmentList.data;
var TaskList=skuid.model.getModel('Task');
tasklistRow=TaskList.data;

var taskset=new Set();
for(var i=0;i<tasklistRow.length;i++) {
if(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c!==null)
    taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
}

//getting Department_no_c for Active Application
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active')
    departmentforactiveapplication=activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
}
if(departmentforactiveapplication!==null) {
    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
        if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c==departmentforactiveapplication) {
            activeDeptNo=productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c;
        }
    }
}
if(applicationlistRow[0].genesis__CL_Product__c!==null) {
    if(productdepartmentlistRow.length>0) {
        for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
            if(activeDeptNo!==0) {
                for(var k=0;k<activeDeptNo-1;k++) {
                    var departmentNode=document.getElementsByClassName('nx-list-contents')[0].children[k].children[0].children[0];
                    departmentNode.style.setProperty("color","#00ae35");
                }
                if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c<=activeDeptNo) {
                    if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                            return true;
                    }
                    else {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            }
            else {
                if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                    return true;
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="EnableTaskSetupBasedOnDepartment" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var ApplicationList=skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');
applicationlistRow = ApplicationList.data;
var ProductDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
productdepartmentlistRow=ProductDepartmentList.data;
var ActiveDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('AppDept');
activedepartmentlistRow=ActiveDepartmentList.data;
var TaskList=skuid.model.getModel('Task');
tasklistRow=TaskList.data;

var taskset=new Set();
for(var i=0;i<tasklistRow.length;i++) {
    if(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c!==null) {
        taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
    }
}
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
    if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active') {
        departmentforactiveapplication=activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
    }
}
if(departmentforactiveapplication!==null) {
    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
        if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c==departmentforactiveapplication)
        activeDeptNo=productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c;
    }
}
if(applicationlistRow[0].genesis__CL_Product__c!==null) {
    if(productdepartmentlistRow.length>0) {
        for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
            if(activeDeptNo!==0) {
                if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c<=activeDeptNo) {
                        if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c))
                                continue;
                        else
                            return true;
                }
                else {
                    return true;
                }
            }
            else {
                if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                    continue;
                }
                else {
                    return true;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
}

//getting Department_no_c for Active Application
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
    if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active')

    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {

      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
	             //Custom Added by Subham starts----
	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}]
	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                         { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
                         //Custom Added by Subham starts----
        	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}
        	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
        	             ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanCLProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;

</jsitem>

	<components>
		<pagetitle model="CommonApplicationModel" uniqueid="AppDetailTitleHeader">
			<actions>
				<action type="multi" label="Save" icon="" uniqueid="sk-2eAI-193">
					<renderconditions logictype="and"/>
					<enableconditions/>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="beforePopup"/>
						
						
						<action type="custom" snippet="saveApplication">
							<onerroractions>
								<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error while saving..." timeout="2000"/>
							</onerroractions>
						</action>
						<action type="adoptRows" model="OrgParameter" sourcemodel="OrgParameter" targetmodel="OrgParameter" affectedrows="context"/>
					</actions>
				</action>
			</actions>
			<renderconditions logictype="and">
				<rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="CommonApplicationModel" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Name" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>

			</renderconditions>
		</pagetitle>
		<pagetitle model="CommonApplicationModel" uniqueid="AppTitleHeader">
			<actions>
				<action type="multi" label="Save" icon="" uniqueid="sk-2eAI-199">
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="beforePopup"/>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="CommonApplicationModel">
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="showPopup">
									<popup width="60%">
										<components>
											<template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2YNQ-2016">
												<contents>With Loan Term/Frequency/Close_Date being modifed ,Maturity Date will be changed.

Select "Yes" to save the new values to application and "No" to retain the old values.</contents>
											</template>
											<buttonset model="CommonApplicationModel" uniqueid="sk-2YNU-2035">
												<buttons>
													<button type="multi" label="Yes" uniqueid="sk-2YNV-2043">
														<actions>
															<action type="custom" snippet="changeDate"/>
															<action type="custom" snippet="saveApplication"/>
															<action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
														</actions>
													</button>
													<button type="multi" label="No" uniqueid="sk-2YNb-2094">
														<actions>
															<action type="custom" snippet="saveApplication"/>
															<action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
														</actions>
													</button>
												</buttons>
											</buttonset>
										</components>
									</popup>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
							<formula>(({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldTerm}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newTerm}}}) || ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldFrequency}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newFrequency}}}) || (({{{$Model.OrgParameter.data.0.genesis__Use_Expected_Close_Date__c}}} == true) && ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldCloseDate}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newCloseDate}}}))) && ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldTerm}}}!== -1)</formula>
						</action>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop">
							
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="showPopup">
									<popup width="60%">
										<components>
											<template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2k3X-1437">
												<contents>With Loan Amount/Interest Rate /Amortization Term/Interest Only Period being modified Payment Amount will be changed.
Select "Yes" to save the new values to application and "No" to retain the old values.</contents>
											</template>
											<buttonset uniqueid="sk-2k3W-1429">
												<buttons>
													<button type="multi" label="Yes" uniqueid="sk-2k3g-1503">
														<actions>
															<action type="custom" snippet="generateSchedule"/>
															<action type="custom" snippet="saveApplication"/>
															<action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
														</actions>
													</button>
													<button type="multi" label="No" uniqueid="sk-2k3g-1510"/>
												</buttons>
											</buttonset>
										</components>
									</popup>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						<formula>(({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldExpectedFirstPaymentDate}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newExpectedFirstPaymentDate}}})||({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldLoanAmount}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newLoanAmount}}}) || ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldRequestedLoanAmount}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newRequestedLoanAmount}}}) || ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldInterestRate}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newInterestRate}}}) || ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldAmortizationTerm}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newAmortizationTerm}}}) || ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldInterestOnlyPeriod}}} !== {{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.newInterestOnlyPeriod}}})) && ({{{$Model.CommonApplicationModel.data.0.oldTerm}}} !== -1) && ({{{$Model.ApplicationRecordType.data.0.DeveloperName}}} == 'Loan')</formula>
</action>
						<action type="custom" snippet="saveApplication">
							<onerroractions>
								<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error while saving..." timeout="3000"/>
							</onerroractions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<renderconditions logictype="and"/>
					<enableconditions/>
				</action>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="convert" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');

    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ConvertApplicationCtrl','convertApplicationToContract',

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="providerOnLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var integrationProvider = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderModel').data;
var providerUIModel = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel');
$.each(integrationProvider,function(i,row){
    let familyName = row.intframework__Integration_Family__r.Name;
    if (familyName == 'Consumer Credit') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isFicoActive : true
        });
    }else if (familyName == 'UCC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isUCCActive : true
        });
    } else if (familyName == 'Documents And Disclosures') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isDocumentsAndDisclosures : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYCActive : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYB') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYBActive : true
        });
    }  else if(familyName == 'E Sign') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isESignActive : true
        });
	}
		else if(familyName == 'Corporate Information') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isCorporateInformationActive : true
        });
    }
});</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="reLoadPolicyCondition" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

//Update Policy Conditions New Page model
var policyConditionsEnhancedModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');

setTimeout(function(){ 

    var policyConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
    var policyConditionValue;
    $.each(policyConditionModel.data, function(i, row) {
        var j = i+1;
        policyConditionValue = document.querySelector("#policyTable > div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(" + j + ") > td:nth-child(6) > div > div");
        
        if (policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Exception" ||
        policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Rejected") {
        policyConditionValue.classList.add("red-textbox");//red color
        } else if(policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "In File" ||
            policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Pending" ) {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("amber-textbox");//amber color
        }
        else {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("blue-textbox");//blue color
        }
    });

}, 1000);</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="updateApplicationOnPopup">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__Save_Application}}");

$.blockUI({
    message: message,
    onBlock:function(){
        saveApplication();
    }
});	
function saveApplication(){
    var applicationM = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var applicationData = applicationM.data[0];
    var newAppParams = {};
    var paramsMap = {};
    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationM;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = null;
    newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    
    paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    paramsMap.AddFeeToLoanAmount = true;
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap;
    
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    applicationData.updateApplication = false;
    $.unblockUI();
    location.reload();
}

	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "Please Wait While The Loan Is Booked To Core...");
$.blockUI({
message: message,
onBlock:function(){
BookCIFToCore();
}
});	
	
function BookCIFToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCIFCalloutClass','bookToCoreCIFFromBackEnd',
        {
            applicationId : scRow.Id,
        });
    console.log(result);
    if(result == 'Success'){
        BookLoanToCore();
    }
    else{
        alert('Result: ' + result);
    }
}
function BookLoanToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCalloutClass','bookToCoreLoanFromBackEnd',
    {
        applicationId : scRow.Id,
    });
    console.log(result);
    if(result != 'Success'){
        //alert('Result: ' + result);
        return displayMessage(result);
    }
    skuid.model.updateData([scModels],function(){
        $.unblockUI();
    });
}


var displayMessage = function (message) {
        console.log('error');
         $('#ExceptionHeader').data('object').editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
            }
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        return false;
    };</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="generateModificationAgreeMaturity">var params = arguments[0],

ui-button iconic-button iconic-button-edit ui-state-focushtml {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
    height: 100%;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content .ui-tabs-nav {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    height: 40px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content > div.ui-tabs-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 46px;
    bottom: 6px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-grid {
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 40%;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-right-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 40%;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 0 0 10px !important;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-title {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 65px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 50%;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-parties-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section div,
#loan-dashboard-parties-section div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#relationship-dashboard,
#collateral-tab,
#construction-tab,
#approvals-dashboard{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#construction-help {
    position: absolute;
    top: -42px;
    right: 10px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 28px;
    border: none !important;
}

#loan-details-iframe,
#document-iframe,
#party-iframe {
    border: none;
}

div[pagename="NGLoanDashBoard"] {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-3 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-5 {
    overflow:hidden;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-6 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-7 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-9 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-11 {
    overflow-y:scroll;
}

#fs-statement-tab{
    background: white;
}

#convert-to-contract-button{
    background: #1CBDD4;
    height: 35px;
    width: 35px;
    border-style: solid;
    font-size: 40px;
    border-width: thin;
}
.fa-arrow-circle-right
{
        background: #1CBDD4;
    margin-top: -0.5em;
    margin-left: -25px;
}
.shift-arrow-to-left{
    margin-left: -45px;
}

.shift-arrow-to-right{
    margin-left: 40px;
}

.skuid-contract-button.ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-edit.ui-state-focus:before{
     content: "\f061";
    font-size: 24px;
    color: white;
    background: #1CBDD4;
    vertical-align: top;
}
#LeasePricingFee{
    top:34px;
}
#Pricing{
    top:32px;
}
#RateCardPricing{
    top:32px;
}
#LpPricingTabSet{
    top:50px;
}

    background-color: #dcdcdc1a;
    fill: #48ce94;
    top:7px;
}

#LeasePricingTab .nx-template {
    color : #37444e;
}

#LeasePricingTab > ul {
    background-color : #dddddd;
    outline: none !important;
}
#questionnairePageIncludeID{
    overflow-y:auto !important;
    min-height:500px !important;
    max-height:600px!important
    
}
#LeasePricingTab > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-active{
    background-color : #dddddd;
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom: 5px solid #2D5074;
    border-left-color: transparent !important;
    outline: none !important;
}
#LeasePricingTab > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-state-hover {
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom:5px solid #8ac8ff !important;

#LeasePricingFee .nx-page, #lease-pricing-tab .sk-wrapper,#RateCardPricing .nx-page, #Pricing .nx-page,#LpPricingTabSet .nx-page{

 text-transform: none !important;

}
#unlock-button{
    content: "\f09c";
    color:#48CE94 ;
    height: 35px;
    width: 35px;
    border:2px solid #48CE94;
    font-size: 24px;
    background: white;

    font-family: FontAwesome;
    border-radius: 50%;
    line-height: 30px;

    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: right;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: normal;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
}
#unlock-button > span.ui-button-icon-primary.ui-icon.fa-unlock-alt.sk-icon.inline{
    left: 0em;
}
#unlock-button > .ui-button-text {
    display: none;
}
